title: Donald Deskey Archive
medium: Letters, photographs & patents relating to the NY Type 10 Lighting project
description:
Archives of the Type 10 New York City Light Pole invented by Donald Deskey, Alexander Lurkis and Anton Pecha.
This collection includes:
File #1-Book of Photos of Lampposts of New York City Prior 1959 Standards.
Photos of Lamposts at 42nd Street and Fifth Avenue-Prior 1959 Standard with Street Furniture.
File #2 -Patents for Type 10 Lighting Standard and Base Granted to Donald Deskey, Alexander Lurkis and Anton Pecha.
File #3- Donald Deskey Associates - Type 10 Pole Drawings.
File #4- NYCity Department of Water Supply, Gas & Electricity-Bureau of Gas & Electricity- Type 10 Pole Drawings.
File#5- Street Lighting Equipment Corp.-Type 10 Pole Shaft Drawing.
File #6- New York City Type 10 Pole Photos.
File #7 - 3/12/68 ALCOA Calculation for Type 10 Pole at 35 Ft. Mounting Height and 15 Ft. Luminaire Arm.
File#8 - Correspondence NYCity Type 10 Pole - NYCity/Donald Deskey Assoc. Re: Licensing.
File#9 - 9/4/64 Donald Deskey Assoc. & Lurkis Agreement Re: Licensing NYCity Type 10 Pole.
File #10 - Agreement & Correspondence Re: Lurkis/Pecha Base Patent for NYCity Type 10 Pole and Royalties therefrom.
File #11 - Correspondence, Legal Opinion & Proposed Agreement Re: Deskey Rights Vs. Street Lighting Equipment Corp.
File #12 - Publicity Re: NYCity Type 10 Pole
File #13- Royalty Payments for NYCity Type 10 Pole and Base to NYCity, Deskey, Lurkis, Pecha.
File#14 - Threatened Deskey & Lurkis to be brought into Negligence Case vs Kaiser Aluminium & Chemical Corp. for their installation of a Breakaway Base built on Infringement of Deskey/Lurkis Invention of NYCity Type 10 Pole.
File #15 - Miscellaneous.
name: Archives
